price: 39. y para quienes, tras sufrir una injusticia, se defienden (sin transgredir los límites que Al-lah ha establecido).
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ إِذَآ أَصَابَهُمُ ٱلۡبَغۡيُ هُمۡ يَنتَصِرُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna idhā aṣābahumu al-baghyu hum yantaṣirūna
